title: How to Draw Jack Jack from the Incredibles

steps.title: Sketch the outline of Jack Jack.
steps.content: Sketch the outline of Jack Jack. This image shows Jack Jack in what could be viewed as either a sitting or a crawling position. The guidelines are as follows: A circle for the head A line for the body Simple lines for legs and feet A horseshoe curving around the body line for the arms, ending in small hand lines.

steps.title: Round out the guidelines by drawing in shapes.
steps.content: Round out the guidelines by drawing in shapes. The shapes are as follows: A larger circle to depict the baby's traditionally larger head; pencil in eye level and mouth level guidelines as well A small neck shape overlapping the head and body A circle for the body Two ovals to form each arm with a circle end for the hands then sausage shapes for the fingers , resting on the ground Circles for the legs and feet.

steps.title: Detail the facial features.
steps.content: Detail the facial features. This is the time to create the cuteness. Draw large eyes with the eyebrows situated way above, as shown. Draw an open, smiling mouth. Add ears Define the roundness of the face Add a wee nose line Don't forget that pointed hairstyle !

steps.title: Sketch in the details of the clothing (or "uniform").
steps.content: Sketch in the details of the clothing (or "uniform"). Add the hands and shoe-covered feet.

steps.title: Outline all of the details you wish to keep as part of the final drawing.
steps.content: Outline all of the details you wish to keep as part of the final drawing. Erase all of the guidelines.

steps.title: Color in Jack Jack.
steps.content: Color in Jack Jack. Use the suggested colors in the image as guidance. Once colored in, you're all done and you've just drawn one of the cutest animated babies ever!
